full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 91 of 236 995 LC3Cmax3 Alessi - cross 1 MR. PAGLIUCA: I'm going to read from line 24, your Honor. 2 THE COURT: Through? 3 MR. PAGLIUCA: 188, line 24. 4 THE COURT: Okay. 5 MR. PAGLIUCA: Thank you. 6 BY MR. PAGLIUCA: 7 Q. The question under oath, again, Mr. Alessi, was: 8 "Q. But, for example, one of Mr. Epstein's friends would say, 'I got a good massage from this person, I recommend her to you.'" 9 And then you said: 10 "A. Yes, he would give me the number." 11 Do you see that at page 188, line 3? 12 A. Who you talking about? 13 Q. I'm reading your answer, Mr. Alessi, to the question. In answer to the question: 14 "Q. One of Mr. Epstein's friends would say to you, 'I got a good massage from this person. I recommend her to you.'" 15 And your answer was: 16 "A. Yes, he would give me the number." 17 Correct? 18 A. Can I answer the question? 19 Q. Did you say that, Mr. Alessi, did you answer that question under oath in 2016 in that fashion? 20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012605
